title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5012.5 - Miscellaneous
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5012.5 - Miscellaneous

State Regulations
(a) All number
selections or other information appearing on a Take Five bet ticket shall be
deemed to be made or given exclusively by the player. Where one person submits
a ticket as agent or nominee for another person or persons, the Lottery shall
not be deemed to have any knowledge of such transaction, and all dealings of
the commission will be conducted with the bearer of the ticket. (b) Take Five bet tickets may be canceled, once issued, by the issuing computer terminal within the time permitted by the
commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5012.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
